title: Sans-serif Pairing for Bell MT/Scotch Roman/Baskerville
content: Can anyone recommend a sans-serif face to go with a serif like Bell MT, Scotch Roman or Baskerville? Thanks in advance!
author: BradB

comments.content: Scroll to the "warm" part of my [grotesque sans list](http://web.archive.org/web/20111215102354/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/helvetica-and-alternatives-to-helvetica/).
